title: Google’s Agent2Agent Protocol Helps AI Agents Talk to Each Other
author: Frederic Lardinois
description: At its Cloud Next Conference, Google today announced A2A, a new protocol for helping AI agents communicate with each other.
cntitle: Google的Agent2Agent协议帮助AI Agent互相交流
cndescription: 在 Google Cloud Next 大会上，Google 今天宣布了 A2A，这是一种新的协议，旨在帮助 AI 代理相互通信。
